summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Administrative Services and Public Safety Action Program; establishing a position; increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1990 Budget of the Department of Administrative Services; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund; authorizing the Director of Administrative Services and the Purchasing Agent to enter into long-term financing agreements for capital equipment; conditionally authorizing the City Comptroller to issue obligations of the City to provide alternative financing for such acquisitions, and declaring an emergency therefor.
